articles.title: Don't count on artificial sweeteners for weight loss, experts say - Safety+Health Magazine
articles.description: Switching to diet soda to try to shed a few pounds? The World Health Organization says use of non-sugar sweeteners in foods and beverages “does not confer any long-term benefit in reducing body fat.”
